widget.name: iPersonality!
widget.description: iPersonality is helps users to identify respective their nature, temperament, preferred career, strengths and weaknesses. The assessment is done using the concepts of MBTI, and asking 4 questions briefly and then generating a final report on each test. The Application also has a resource-center to have an overview of all different 16-types of Personalities.
widget.author: Sameer Ahmed Khan
